TraitDef.label: Colovian Heritage
TraitDef.description: This Imperial comes from the western highlands of Cyrodiil, possessing the martial traditions and simple values of the Colovian Estates. Colovians are known for their military prowess and straightforward nature.

li.label: Colovian Highlander
li.description: Raised in the military traditions of western Cyrodiil, this pawn values honor, duty, and martial excellence.

TraitDef.label: Nibenese Heritage
TraitDef.description: This Imperial comes from the eastern heartlands of Cyrodiil, possessing the sophisticated culture and mercantile traditions of the Nibenay Valley. Nibenese are known for their cosmopolitan outlook and magical aptitude.

li.label: Nibenese Cosmopolitan
li.description: Raised in the sophisticated culture of eastern Cyrodiil, this pawn excels in commerce, diplomacy, and scholarly pursuits.

TraitDef.label: Imperial Legion Heritage
TraitDef.description: This Imperial comes from a family with a long tradition of service in the Imperial Legion, possessing the discipline, loyalty, and tactical knowledge of the Empire's military elite.

li.label: Legion Veteran
li.description: Born into a military family, this pawn has been raised with the discipline and tactical knowledge of the Imperial Legion.

TraitDef.label: Forebear Heritage
TraitDef.description: This Redguard follows the Forebear traditions of the Ra Gada settlers, emphasizing adaptability, trade, and integration with other cultures while maintaining their warrior heritage.

li.label: Ra Gada Descendant
li.description: Descended from the original Ra Gada warriors, this pawn balances martial prowess with adaptability and commerce.

TraitDef.label: Crown Heritage
TraitDef.description: This Redguard follows the Crown traditions of ancient nobility, emphasizing honor, traditional values, and the preservation of ancient Yokudan culture and martial arts.

li.label: Noble Traditionalist
li.description: Born into the ancient Crown nobility, this pawn upholds the traditional ways of Yokuda and the old sword-singing arts.

TraitDef.label: Sword-singing Tradition
TraitDef.description: This Redguard comes from a lineage that preserves the ancient art of sword-singing, the mystical warrior tradition that once split atoms with blade-work.

li.label: Sword-singer Initiate
li.description: Trained in the remnants of the ancient sword-singing arts, this pawn possesses exceptional blade mastery and spiritual discipline.

TraitDef.label: Knightly Order Heritage
TraitDef.description: This Breton belongs to one of High Rock's many knightly orders, possessing the chivalric code, martial training, and noble ideals of Breton feudal society.

li.label: Knight-Errant
li.description: Trained in the chivalric traditions of High Rock's knightly orders, this pawn follows a code of honor and martial excellence.

TraitDef.label: Mages Guild Heritage
TraitDef.description: This Breton comes from a family with strong ties to the magical institutions of High Rock, possessing deep knowledge of the arcane arts and scholarly traditions.

li.label: Guild Magister
li.description: Raised in the magical traditions of High Rock, this pawn possesses exceptional knowledge of the arcane arts and scholarly methods.

TraitDef.label: Feudal Noble Heritage
TraitDef.description: This Breton comes from the fractured nobility of High Rock, possessing the political acumen, cultural refinement, and leadership skills of the feudal aristocracy.

li.label: Feudal Lord
li.description: Born into High Rock's complex feudal system, this pawn excels in politics, culture, and the art of leadership.

TraitDef.label: Nordic Clan Heritage
TraitDef.description: This Nord belongs to one of Skyrim's ancient clans, possessing the warrior traditions, honor code, and survival skills passed down through generations of harsh northern living.

li.label: Clan Warrior
li.description: Born into one of Skyrim's ancient clans, this pawn carries the warrior traditions and survival wisdom of their ancestors.

TraitDef.label: Thu'um Heritage
TraitDef.description: This Nord comes from a bloodline with ancient ties to the Thu'um, the dragon-speech of old Skyrim. While few can truly master the Voice, this heritage grants spiritual strength and leadership qualities.

li.label: Voice-Blessed
li.description: Born with traces of the ancient Thu'um in their blood, this pawn possesses natural leadership and spiritual strength.

TraitDef.label: Atmoran Legacy
TraitDef.description: This Nord can trace their lineage back to the original Atmoran settlers who followed Ysgramor to Skyrim, possessing the ancient traditions and fierce independence of the first Nords.

li.label: Atmoran Descendant
li.description: Descended from Ysgramor's companions, this pawn carries the ancient traditions and indomitable spirit of the first Nords.

TraitDef.label: Nordic Skald Heritage
TraitDef.description: This Nord comes from the bardic tradition of the skalds, the storytellers and musicians who preserve Nordic culture and history through song and tale.

li.label: Wandering Skald
li.description: Trained in the ancient bardic traditions of Skyrim, this pawn excels in storytelling, music, and preserving cultural knowledge.

TraitDef.label: Eastmarcher Heritage
TraitDef.description: This Nord comes from the eastern regions of Skyrim, particularly the Eastmarches around Windhelm. Eastmarchers are known for their traditional values, strong clan loyalty, and resistance to foreign influence.

li.label: Eastmarcher Traditionalist
li.description: Raised in the traditional strongholds of eastern Skyrim, this pawn values ancient Nord customs and clan honor above all else.

TraitDef.label: Westmarcher Heritage
TraitDef.description: This Nord hails from western Skyrim, including the Reach and Haafingar. Westmarchers tend to be more cosmopolitan and adaptable, having dealt with diverse populations and cultures.

li.label: Westmarcher Adaptable
li.description: From the diverse western holds of Skyrim, this pawn combines Nordic strength with cultural flexibility and diplomatic skills.

TraitDef.label: Skaal Heritage
TraitDef.description: This Nord belongs to the Skaal tribe of Solstheim, preserving the most ancient Nordic traditions and maintaining harmony with nature. The Skaal follow the old ways and revere the All-Maker.

li.label: Skaal Shaman
li.description: Raised in the ancient traditions of the Skaal, this pawn possesses deep knowledge of nature spirits and traditional survival methods.

TraitDef.label: Cyro-Nord Heritage
TraitDef.description: This Nord comes from a family that has lived in Cyrodiil for generations, blending Nordic traditions with Imperial sophistication. They serve as bridges between cultures while maintaining their Nordic identity.

li.label: Imperial-Nord Diplomat
li.description: Born and raised in Cyrodiil while maintaining Nordic heritage, this pawn excels in diplomacy and cross-cultural understanding.
